detail_description: Capitán Mandy is a mid-range seafood restaurant located in San Andres Island, Colombia. It is known for its delicious Caribbean and Latin cuisine, offering a cozy atmosphere and exceptional service. The menu features recommended dishes such as fried fish and seafood. While the restaurant mainly focuses on seafood, it also offers limited vegetarian options like vegetarian rice and pasta with garlic and veggies. Visitors have praised the quality of the dishes considering the restaurant's specialty in seafood.
name: Capitán Mandy
address: #4b-2 a, Av Providencia #446, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Gourmet Shop Assho is a top-rated restaurant in San Andres, offering a blend of international and local cuisine with beautifully presented dishes. The menu features a variety of seafood, meat, and vegetarian options made with fresh island produce. Visitors have praised the warm and welcoming atmosphere as well as the high-quality dishes such as carrot soup, peppercorn steak, and shrimp and salmon salad.
name: Gourmet Shop Assho
address: 880001, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

excerpt: Colorful waterside Colombia restaurant offering hearty comfort plates, seafood dishes & cocktails.
detail_description: La Regatta is a vibrant restaurant located by the waterside in Colombia, known for its hearty comfort plates, seafood dishes, and cocktails. It's a favorite among many for special occasions due to its high-quality food and top-notch service. The restaurant offers an experience even before dining, with a colorful pier adorned with local art and relics of a pirate ship. The menu features upscale options like hot garlic crab claws, lobster tail in bechamel, and conch in coconut sauce.
name: La Regatta
address: Cra. 1 #3 - 121, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Fisherman Place is a small, local beachside restaurant in San Andres Town that features fresh seafood. It's owned and operated by locals and can get busy, so be prepared to wait. The lobster is especially popular here and the view is fantastic.
name: Fisherman Place
address: Cra. 4 #2-37, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: If you're looking for a delightful culinary experience during your travels, Miss Celia Restaurante is a must-visit. Nestled close to the stunning beaches, this charming eatery offers an array of traditional Colombian dishes infused with modern flair. The ambiance captures the essence of the Caribbean, from its vibrant decor to the enticing aromas wafting from the kitchen, where specialties like snail stew are prepared with care.
name: Miss Celia Restaurante
address: Cl. 2, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: If you're looking for a delicious seafood meal, Donde Francesca should be your go-to choice. With both a full bar and outdoor seating, this restaurant is perfect for relaxing on the beach or enjoying live music in the evenings.
name: Donde Francesca
address: San Luis, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Mahi Mahi is a restaurant located in the Casablanca Hotel, offering a Thai-themed dining experience. The restaurant provides a variety of menus including Italian, oriental, and international options. Customers can enjoy seafood dishes and other non-fish options such as vegetarian, red meat, or poultry. The atmosphere is pleasant with good decor and friendly service. While some visitors found the food to be just okay, others were pleasantly surprised by the flavorful dishes like chicken green curry and coconut curry.
name: Mahi Mahi
address: Cra. 4 #2-37, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Trattoria Mr. Panino is a surprising find on the small island of San Andres, offering delicious Italian cuisine. The menu includes a variety of options such as pasta, risotto, bruschetta, meats, seafood dishes, and sandwiches. Visitors have praised the generous portion sizes and recommended trying dishes like pasta al pesto and pasta carbonara. The restaurant also offers a selection of 49 food and drink items on its menu. Guests have highlighted the attentive service from friendly staff members.
name: Trattoria Mr. Panino
address: #2-2 a 2190 Calle 2, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: The Islander is a popular restaurant known for its Caribbean-inspired fast food, particularly its seafood burgers like the shrimp burger. The menu also features wraps, tacos, and salads made with fresh, high-quality ingredients. Additionally, the restaurant offers a delightful breakfast menu. Located at Hotel Decameron Isleno, it's considered one of the best premium beachfront bars with excellent service and a diverse gastronomic selection. Visitors can enjoy a variety of dishes ranging from seafood to meat and poultry with tropical flavors.
name: The Islander
address: Cl. 1 #101 a 10-247, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Restaurante Niko’s Sea Food is a gem that captures the essence of Caribbean and Colombian seafood cuisine. Located in San Andres, it offers a delightful experience with its delectable seafood dishes. Despite its unassuming appearance, the restaurant boasts attentive and friendly staff who ensure a pleasant dining experience. Visitors can savor mouthwatering dishes such as salmon in garlic butter sauce or rice with shrimp while enjoying the warm hospitality of the staff.
name: Restaurante Niko’s Sea Food
address: Cl. 1 #1130 #1-2 a, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

name: Restaurante y Bar Tico Tico
address: al lado de hotel calipso, Av peatonal, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

name: Restaurante Mari's Play
address: Cra. 1a #1147 #1-1 a, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

excerpt: Pizza, ceviches & Angus burgers offered in a colorful, casual restaurant with outdoor seating.
detail_description: Seaweed is a casual restaurant with outdoor seating that serves pizza, ceviches, and Angus burgers. It is colorful and full of atmosphere, with a lively feel that will make you want to come back for more. The menu features a variety of Latin and Caribbean dishes as well as seafood options, making it the perfect spot for anyone looking for something different. Late night hours are also available if you're looking to get your grub on afterhours.
name: Seaweed
address: a 4b-116, Cra. 1 #4b-2, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

excerpt: Modern beachfront hotel featuring multiple restaurants, plus free breakfast & an outdoor pool.
detail_description: Hotel Casablanca is a modern beachfront hotel located in San Andres, Colombia. It offers 91 rooms including standard double rooms, superior double rooms, and bungalows. The hotel features multiple restaurants and provides free breakfast to guests. With an outdoor pool and easy access to the nearby beach, it's strategically located just a short walk from downtown San Andres. Additionally, the hotel offers services such as car rental, business center facilities, and meeting rooms.
name: Hotel Casablanca
address: Av. Colombia #59, San Andrés, Islas, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Beer Station in San Andrés is a popular spot offering American cuisine, fast food, and a bar. Located on Avenida Colombia 1a-16 Lc 102, it's known for its diverse menu featuring hamburgers, wings, ribs, chicken fingers, and hot dogs. The restaurant offers little tables for sharing where you can sample a variety of dishes. While the prices may seem high in Colombian pesos, they are quite affordable when compared to the euro.
name: Beer Station - San Andrés
address: Av. Colombia #55a1, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Hamburguesas El Corral is a popular burger chain in Colombia that constantly evolves its menu to cater to new and demanding clientele. Despite its fast food vibe, the restaurant uses good quality ingredients, reflected in their reasonably priced meals. It's an ideal spot for a post-drinks snack or to enjoy the sunset with friendly service and a beachside view. The location offers a covered terrace for protection from the elements and accepts credit cards.
name: Hamburguesas El Corral
address: Av. Colombia #No. 1A -16, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

name: Namaste Beach Club San Andres
address: G7VV+7R, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Mediterraneo Pizzeria & Sports Bar is a must-visit destination for sports enthusiasts and food lovers alike. Nestled on the island, this unique venue stands out as the only sports bar of its kind in the area. Not only can you catch your favorite games on multiple screens, but you can also indulge in some of Colombia's finest pizza, baked to perfection in a custom oven with a secret recipe that adds an air of mystery to each slice.
name: Mediterraneo Pizzeria & Sports Bar
address: Cra. 6 #1-100, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Kingston Jerk Spot is a must-visit for those craving Jamaican-style food in the Caribbean. While their Jerk Chicken is a standout, the pork and chicken curry are also highly recommended. The spot offers reasonably priced meals and has a small, cozy setting with about 5 tables. Visitors praise the delicious jerk sauce and generous portions served with rice, French fries, salad, and soup.
name: Kingston Jerk Spot
address: 01, San Luis, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia

detail_description: Bocca De Oro is a fantastic dining spot with amazing food and a lively atmosphere. The sauteed veggies are particularly noteworthy, offering a unique and delicious taste. Visitors can enjoy live reggae music while savoring dishes like the Picada Coco Loco, featuring Dorado fish and lobster. While the service may be a bit slow, it's friendly and accommodating.
name: Bocca De Oro
address: Cra. 1 #2252 2-58 a, San Andrés, San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia
